title: Bryce
description: Pompous, self-righteous, arrogant, cocky…Bryce Sears is the best IP lawyer in the country—and he knows it.Expanding his firm is the only goal on the horizon.Until he’s blindsided by Brenna Smith, a genius hellbent on changing the world with her medical technology.She’s superior in intellect and intolerant of his BS.She’s also the most beautiful woman he’s ever laid eyes on.The more they clash, the more he wants her, to the point he can’t focus.She’s infuriating and caring, ruthless yet kind.When she finally gives in, the conflict escalates, and he’s forced to make a decision…Will he wager everything, for a lifetime with her?
author: Alex   Wolf
